parameters: GabText Sounds like the chandelier broke through the ground...
This chains seems to keep the chandelier hanging...
Cut the chain with the \c[2]Bolt cutters\c[0]
Cut the chain with the \c[2]Bolt cutters\c[0]
The galvanised chain seems tough and durable You'll need
some serious leverage to cut it.
This chains seems to keep the chandelier hanging...
The galvanised chain seems tough and durable You'll need
some serious leverage to cut it.
The body of the pillarman is incredibly sturdy. Seems like the
"I'm not entirely sure what has caused this man to grow this huge.
He is humongous in every sense of the word. Except for where it
counts. His muscles are almost bursting out from the torso."
"The skin is peeled from the top of his head and nailed on the
chest and back to expose the disfigured head that is shaped
like an anvil. The exposed skull even feels as thick as one."
"The man doesn't suffer from similar malformations and burns as
the people outside. His skin is very pale in fact. Almost like
he hasn't seen sun in years."
"The pillarman has no particular weaknesses other than otherwordly
powers having an increased effect on him."
You are not entirely sure what has caused this man to grow this
huge. He is humongous in every sense of the word. Except for his
groin area. His muscles are almost bursting out from the torso.
The skin is peeled from the top of his head and nailed on the
chest and back to expose the disfigured head that is shaped
like an anvil. The exposed skull even feels as thick as one.
The man doesn't suffer from similar malformations and burns as
the people you saw outside. His skin is very pale in fact. Almost
like he hasn't seen sun in years.
The pillarman has no particular weaknesses other than otherwordly
powers having an increased effect on him.
The soul is too corrupted and frail to be summoned back to
A pile of flesh remains here...
There is rope tied on the beam...
There appears to be a body of a woman in a wedding dress
hanging at the end of the rope.
There is something shining on her hand...
GabText You didn't even realize how tall the church really was...

Black Kalev has got a blank expression on his face. He's slowly
chewing a brown tuft of weed in his mouth.
The more you look at Kalev, the more annoyed he starts to look.
\N[16] is staring calmly at the distant horizon...
\N[17] is looking around, mouth open, being his clueless
\N[19] seems itchy and twitchy. He is constantly scratching
himself. Even from places that are not suitable to public...
\N[22] tilts his head sideways as you try to communicate
\N[28] has got an oddly pleased expression on his face. His
disturbed smile gives you the creeps...
\N[29] looks very tense and stiff. Seems like he cannot have
a moment's rest as he's waiting for your next orders.
"Ah... I-I'm not sure if it's a good idea to go here..."
"You're the one who should be afraid! I wouldn't bet on your depth
perception with that eyepatch of yours!"
"Just don't look down. Imagine the beams are only a couple of meters
Levi is walking on the beams pretty casually. The heights don't
seem to be a problem for him.
"You can hold my hand if it's any help."
Black Kalev has got a blank expression on his face. He's slowly
chewing a brown tuft of weed in his mouth.
The more you look at Kalev, the more annoyed he starts to look.
